text: Edward John "Ted" Phillips (21 August 1933 - 9 January 2018) was an English retired footballer. Phillips died on 9 January 2018 from dementia at the age of 84.Ex-Ipswich Town star Ted Phillips dies aged 84 ==Honours== Ipswich Town * Football League First Division Winner (1): 1961–62 * Football League Second Division Winner (1): 1960–61 * Football League Third Division South Winner (1): 1956–57 Individual * Ipswich Town Hall of Fame: Inducted 2007 ==Sources== * * ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Ipswich Town F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Suffolk
title: Ted Phillips
